pr_title: [ML] Do not start data frame analytics when too many docs are analyzed

timeline.message:
[ML] Do not start data frame analytics when too many docs are analyzed

The data frame structure in c++ has a limit on 2^32 documents. This commit
adds a check that the number of documents involved in the analysis are
less than that and fails to start otherwise. That saves the cost of
reindexing when it is unnecessary.

timeline.bodyText: [nit] IMO it would be better to remove the default implementation from this interface and put it in OutlierDetection.
